title: Couple
alt: Facebook defines relationships. 'Yeah, we would have broken up last night, but the net connection was down.'
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan in bed.]
Cueball: So is this it? Are we a couple now?Megan: I just don't know. I like this. I just... don't know.[Silence.]Cueball: Well will you be my "it's complicated" on Facebook?
